short_summary: procuring multiple items for the Victoria-Class ships, including mounts, resilient utility items, and maintenance kits. The solicitation is only open to Canadian suppliers.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Multiple Victoria-Class Spares

**Procurement Reference Number:** `cb-523-16321655`

**Contracting Authority:** Department of National Defence

The Department of National Defence, in partnership with the Canadian Armed Forces, invites bidders to submit proposals for the supply of various spares required for the Victoria-class submarines.

### Itemized Requirements:

The requirements include:

- Mount, Resilient, Weapon System
  - [Listed itemized quantities with specifications](#mount-resilient-weapon-system)
- Mount, Resilient, Utility
  - [Listed itemized quantities with specifications](#mount-resilient-utility)
- Nonmetallic Channel
  - [Listed itemized quantities with specifications](#nonmetallic-channel)
- Maintenance Kit, Electronic Equipment
  - [Listed itemized quantities with specifications](#maintenance-kit-electronic-equipment)

### Submission Requirements

Bidders must provide a comprehensive proposal, including:

* A detailed description of the proposed goods/services
* A breakdown of the costs and pricing
* A copy of the certificate of insurance
* Proof of qualification and experience
* Any other requisite documentation specified in the tender package

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Lowest Price
* Technical Compliance
* Schedule Compliance
* Capability and Capacity
* Financial Stability

### Contract Details

The contract is expected to start on a yet-to-be-determined date and will last for the duration as stipulated in the tender package.

### Contact Information

For inquiries and clarifications, please contact:

Aïcha Diallo (Aicha.Diallo@forces.gc.ca)
819-939-3070

**Note:** This is a translation of the contractor's original entry and may contain slight errors due to translation limitations.

References:

mpwt101101 (ccindustryannov2016)

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26019/w8482-241884-a---annex-a.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26019/w8482-241884-a---rfp.pdf
**Regions Delivered:** Canada
**Request Type:** Request for Proposal
